quote: It is the law of Love which alone can carry you to God.
Every man must first seek to give love if he expects to receive it.
The spiritual laws are based on the Law of Love.
source: How to Survive Spiritually in our Times.

quote: To get love, you must give love wherever and whenever you can, because that is the Law of Love.
source: The Slow Burning Love of God

quote: Love and love alone is the key to God Realization.
source: Wisdom from the Master on Spiritual Leadership

quote: To serve is an expression of divine love.
source: Wisdom from the Master on Spiritual Leadership

quote: One word of love is worth more than a thousand clever speeches.
source: Wisdom from the Master on Spiritual Leadership

quote: Life is God’s blessing to each Soul(you) to learn how to give and receive love.
If man had wisdom he would not be carried away by human desires.
HU, the secret name of God… can be chanted or sung quietly to yourself when you are in trouble or when you need consolation in time of grief.
The word HU has a purifying power for the individual.
It is mostly your ability to change your consciousness to the needs of the moment that counts above all
source: Wisdom from the Master on Spiritual Leadership

quote: Problem with life occur when we don’t understand the laws of ECK-the laws of Spirit
The laws of Life provides the way to higher consciousness as surely the moth is given a way out of the cocoon
We know that there is an answer for every situation that comes up in our life. There is always a way, somehow. What holds us back is our attitudes
Every present thought solidifies into a future condition.
It is not what we do that determines our experience in life, but it is what we expect!
The law of God states that Soul has existence because God wills it
The greatest principle of God is the survival of the individual, that is, Soul.
There simply is no such thing as righteous anger
You make better decisions about what to do or what not to do if you have an understanding of the Law of Cause and Effect.
We are responsible for what we do.
